Professional Certifications

Industry-recognized credentials that advance your career
Our certification programs are designed to meet the highest industry standards and are recognized by leading amusement operators, manufacturers, and regulatory bodies worldwide.

Certified Ride Inspector (CRI)

120 hours | 6 months access

CEU Credits: 12

Comprehensive ride inspection certification covering mechanical, electrical, and structural systems.

  • Visual inspection techniques
  • Non-destructive testing methods
  • Documentation and reporting
  • Regulatory compliance

$2,495

Safety Management Professional (SMP)

80 hours | 4 months access

CEU Credits: 8

Advanced safety management and risk assessment certification for supervisory roles.

  • Safety program development
  • Incident investigation
  • Training program design
  • Emergency response planning

$1,895

Maintenance Excellence Certificate (MEC)

100 hours | 5 months access

CEU Credits: 10

Specialized maintenance certification focusing on preventive and predictive maintenance strategies.

  • Maintenance planning and scheduling
  • Predictive analytics
  • Parts management
  • Technical documentation

$2,195
